title: Florida Florida Florida, Episode 1: Butterfly ballots & Butterfly effects
description:
Meet the Press introduces: Florida Florida Florida. In this new five-part series, Chuck Todd looks back at the enduring political lessons of the 2000 presidential recount.

Lesson 1: Every election is the most important election of our lifetimes.

Lesson 2: Candidates Matter.

Featuring interviews with Stuart Stevens, Tad Devine, "Mac" Stipanovich, Lucy Morgan and archival recordings from NBC News.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
